replies.msg:
連登好多人話冇人推行動post令到場運動就黎輸
但其實好多行動post入到去只係見到行動嘅時間地點
即係純粹話比人知有呢個行動

但其實場運動去到呢個階段
連登係咪應該用黎推行動post呢
係呢度推行動post又有幾大作用呢

首先 依家有唔同嘅社交平台 例如ig fb tg YouTube等等 好多時唔使上連登其實都會知有咩活動
而且上得連登嘅都係後生仔 一定識用以上社交網絡
如果真係要為行動宣傳 我建議都係落返街 或者用Facebook呢啲多啲老人家上嘅媒體

二來 連登呢個平台應該用黎研究新嘅抗爭方式以保持運動嘅溫度

三個月來 警暴一路都係啲人肯上街嘅一個關鍵
但大家連爆眼都經歷過 其實對警暴已經慢慢除左慣左 除非真係有死人消息正式公開 如果唔係咁落去只會越黎越少人

抗爭手法方面 其實一路以黎都係遊行集會
大家已經開始有啲厭
一部份嘅人可能係覺得二百萬人出黎都冇人
再出黎遊行都冇乜大幫助
另一部份嘅人冇能純粹真係覺得真係冇趣味性就唔出
所以即使你洗版式咁推行動post 其實都幫助不大
因為大家係唔願意出 而唔係因為唔知道有行動而唔出
連登依家好多bot洗版 但出黎嘅人都係跌緊(91機場 呂麗乳搖)

所以連登作為年輕一代嘅平台 唔應該做機械人洗版宣傳
而應該集益廣思發揮創意 諗下新嘅抗爭方式
(就算係黎緊929同10月1 其實都有全球反chinazi嘅新主題)
諗下點樣吸引到人出黎
滿足部分人嘅三分鐘熱度 亦都畀希望對遊行集會再冇希望嘅人

我支持連登仔化身連登神探 去查一啲有合理疑點嘅事件 即使未fact check都好 (圍內討論調查唔spread出去)

我亦都支持繼續搞商場和理shop 唱國歌嘅行動
因為呢啲係為運動保溫嘅方法
大家唔好諗會變嘉年華而輸 事實係依家主線已經吸引唔到人出去

我同意落街/facebook更有效
但最驚係連登仔自己都唔知有行動
希望連仔可以加置頂功能
開係時事台都好

"諗下點樣吸引到人出黎"

Just a few minute ago, I talked with an older relative on phone. She thought that young people originally only wanted the bills to withdraw and 5 demands, but now she is surprised to see and hear news about fire, burning things on streets, and physical violence.

She only got info from TV, casual talk with others in market or shops, and newspaper. She did not get info from computer. However, she is very influential in her circle of friends.

My relative may be a representative of some groups of HK people ! They may get fed with biased, incomplete, and fake information from mass media or their friends everyday.

Sometimes there could be a disconnection between what protestors did and what other people PERCEIVE!! There is not a safe, efficient, and timely channel to educate CONTINOUSLY and tell the majority of HK people on reasons behind actions. The disconnection gives CCP opportunities to jump in.

They are part of the target groups that CCP and govt. paid lots of money and effort to use MASS MEDIA to change their hearts by 1) smearing protestors 2) creating fake news and 3) appealing to affections and emotions.

Dream. Science fiction - it will be great if there were a realtime BIG BANNER flying in the air and BIG loudspeaker telling everyone reasons and causes for protestors' actions.

Getting more HK people to buy in and letting them see and feel the hope are important before more people come out. [url]A mass movement needs mass support from people ! Period. [/url]

All sides are NOW trying to sell hard on all form of mass media, create the best perception they can and competing for people's support.

It is necessary to decide on level of importance and urgency for aligning 1) expectation of various age groups and background of HK people 2) their perception and understanding on everyday's events and 3) protestors' actions and its causes.

If drawing the support for older people in HK is not a priority, maybe whatever I said above might not be that important !
